_comment: number of image channels (3 for color, 1 for grayscale)
net_type should use one of the following: vanilla, nonlocal
langevin noise used during training (needed for correct energy scaling during eval)
scaling for eval temp relative to train temp (use 1 for train, > 1 for higher, < 1 for lower)
mcmc_initialization should use one of the following: flowers, mnist, cifar10, gaussian, uniform
langevin step size and noise magnitude
frequency of logging information during langevin sampling
